Title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
Writer: Mark Burton, Richard Starzak, Nick Park (characters created by)
Actors: Justin Fletcher, John Sparkes, Omid Djalili, Richard Webber
Plot: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.
Country: UK, France, USA, Australia, Japan, Germany, Finland, Ireland, China, Belgium
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 49 nominations.
Production: Aardman Animations, Anton Capital Entertainment, Studio Canal
